artist: Artist: David Hockney; Publisher: Tyler Graphics, Ltd., Mount Kisco, New York
description: Diptych mounted vertically; top section (a) is Cubist-style head of a man with curly brown hair and blue eyes, wearing a dark blue and white striped shirt, with one hand on his chin and another holding a cigarette near the PL side of his head; bottom section (b) is man's lower body, with hands next to hips, legs crossed, with brown shoes; grey and white frame with sculptural elements; collage elements on a
inscription: Inscribed in pencil, LLC of part a: Trial / Proof / IV
markings: TGL chop mark (blindstamp), LRC of part a and part b
medium: Color lithograph with collage on two sheets of paper, mounted in artist-designed two-part sculptural wood frame
provenance: Private collection, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 2011.
signed: LRC of a, in pencil: David Hockney  1984-5
title: An Image of Gregory
